div.p: ALL I GET IS DEAD AIR.
TO BE AS ONE OF US?

p.span: NO, BUT I'D LIKE YOU TO

div.p: NOT MORE THAN TWO HOURS AGO,
AND I TESTED IT ON MYSELF.
IT DID NOT RECORD THE SCAR
I CAN SEE THE CAPTAIN IS

p.span: NOR CAN I GET DR. McCOY

div.p: BUT TO CARRY OUT MY PLAN
YOU AND I CAN HANDLE IT.
TO MAKE LOVE TO THAT GIRL.
I CAN FIX THAT FOR YOU.
AND I CAN'T SEEM TO STOP
I AM WHAT I AM, LAYLA...
AND THIS IS FOR MY GOOD?
DO YOU MIND IF I SAY
JUST HOW FAST I CAN PUT
TO THE MUSIC OF THE LUTE.
